name: Mushroom World
description:
(please excuse us we are still awaiting an official art, but don't want to delay the release)

Welcome to Fungville, a joyful and tranquil cliffside town whose residents are fairly personally close with each other (mostly)! You're a farmer who's just moved in, and you've got some business to do here.

Grow crops, sell them, and help your strange new friends uncover mysteries.
